Silver Fox Renewables LLC

Silver Fox Renewables LLC designs, installs and maintains high quality solar-powered energy generation systems.

California solar energy design and installation company Silver Fox Renewables LLC needed a fresh look for their business.

Website Design

Craig Webb Art designed a clean layout with modern typography to suggest clarity of purpose, using blue, orange and yellows to evoke peace and energy.

User Experience

Craig Webb submitted wireframes and a content outline to the client to recommend searchable, user-focused content. Craig Webb researched the solar energy business, wrote original content and worked with the client to write additional content. During development Craig Webb tested prototypes on desktop and iPhone.

Front-End Development

The mobile-first, responsive website is built using SASS, Bootstrap 4, vanilla JavaScript, and custom CSS.
